description: Looking for an "ordinary shirt" that can keep up with all of your adventures? The year-round Merino 150 Base Layer Short Sleeve is up to the challenge. With their Core Spun technology, they've wrapped Merino around a nylon core for added durability while still keeping the comfort of ultra-soft, responsibly sourced Merino next to skin. And select colorways feature a more responsible plant-based-dye technique. Built for consistent comfort, even when wearing a pack, this shirt is ready to explore the world on your back.
name: Smartwool Merino (150) SS Tee - Mens
